channel.title: Looking for testers, and GFX artist
channel.description:
Hey, I launched a project 3 months ago, that I've been working on consecutively. Me and my friend a month ago had mashed our sources, and clients together and started trying to create a really nice and amazing project people will abosolutely enjoy. There's only one thing I'm lacking to make this process easier, and quicker. A few testers / players, to report any bugs they find and test the game, give input some more ideas, etc. And I'm looking for someone who can make a logo and or client background. Please get back to me if you're interested, want to know information, or want to know what our future plans are, and what we're doing. Thank you much appreciated!
[center][u][b]Contact me on skype ; im2high2behere[/b][/u][/center]

item.title: Looking for testers, and GFX artist
